Gatling_Gun_Burst.help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of firing its Gatling Gun arm is a massive burst to cause Moderate Lethal damage and reduce its target's defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Gatling_Gun_Burst.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Gatling Gun Burst!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Gatling_Gun_Sweep.help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of firing its Gatling Gun arm is a sweeping burst to cause Moderate Lethal damage to foes in a wide cone. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Gatling_Gun_Sweep.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Gatling Gun Sweep!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Saw_Swipe.help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of delivering a crushing blow from its drill arm causing High Smashing damage and Moderate Lethal damage over time. Foes that are struck will also be knocked back and disoriented for a short time. Damage: High, Moderate DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Saw_Swipe.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Moderate DoT(Lethal), Foe Disorient, Knockback

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Pandora_Beam_Tell.help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of releasing a devastating beam of energy of energy that deals tremendous amounts of damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Pandora_Beam_Tell.targetHelp: You've been targeted by the Nemesis Monstrosity!
Pandora_Beam_Tell.attackerAttackFloater: The Nemesis Monstrosity prepares to fire its Pandora Beam!

Pandora_Beam.help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of releasing a devastating beam of energy of energy that deals tremendous amounts of damage. Damage: Superior
Pandora_Beam.targetHelp: You're suffering Energy damage over time from the Pandora Beam!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Foot_Stomp.help: The Nemesis Monstrosity can slam its mighty fists into the ground causing heavy damage as well as knocking down and disorienting its targets. Recharge: Slow
Foot_Stomp.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
